label: RadioactiveIsotope
comment: Any of several species of the same chemical element with different masses whose nuclei are unstable and dissipate excess energy by spontaneously emitting radiation in the form of alpha, beta, or gamma rays.

datatypeProperties.comment: A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A note, expressed as text, for this specified radioactive isotope.

objectProperties.comment: A measure of the activity level of this specified radioactive isotope.
The radionuclide details specified for this radioactive isotope.

referencedBy.comment: An isotope applicable to this radioactive material.
